Articles.Content:
Okay, I've been busy with school lately so not much time for the forums, but here goes two new crafts.

This plane is part of my personal hangar, I decided it was worthy of sharing.

The Sparrow V

Throwing random wings together to make a sleek profile.

It's quite agile!

It can fly high, but the jet engine is not optimized for these altitudes, but replacing it with a turbojet is easy.

Next, the FIDO rover by deep space kraken

It's a cute probe rover with a complete set of science equipment. (besides the dish)

It even has monopropellant propulsion units for low gravity environments!

Downloads:

Sparrow: https://www.dropbox.com/s/qpj0m297hs9w8ka/Sparrow-5.craft

FIDO: http://www./download/ukei86h4380rf66/FIDO.craft
That sparrow looks like it'd be great fun to do stunts around the KSC with
